items.title: GP attendance (Level B) at consulting rooms
items.description: Face-to-face GP consult lasting 6–20 minutes with relevant history/exam/management.

items.title: GP attendance (Level C) at consulting rooms
items.description: Face-to-face GP consult lasting at least 20 minutes.

items.title: GP telehealth (video) attendance
items.description: Video telehealth attendance by a GP.

items.title: Sexual health medicine specialist video initial assessment (>=45m)
items.description: Initial assessment via video by sexual health medicine specialist; >=45 minutes; referral; often hospital.
restrictions: Frequency window with related initial items

items.title: Chronic disease management plan (care plan)
items.description: GP management plan including problems/goals/actions and review plan.
